title: Watch: This Bike-Ski Touring Adventure Through the Dolomites Is Next-Level Bikepacking
content:
A 9-day ride through the Dolomites shows that bike adventuring can happen year round, no matter the conditions.

Read the full article at Watch: This Bike-Ski Touring Adventure Through the Dolomites Is Next-Level Bikepacking on Velo.
author: Will Tracy
